channel.title: seed-setting on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in seed-setting on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnaSSA07.CRC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA07G0307300ZS Gene Symbol: BnaSSA07.CRC Gene Name: CRABS CLAW Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaCRCs with domestication preference positively correlate with the seed-setting rate of canola.

item.title: BnaSSC06.CRC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC06G0356800ZS Gene Symbol: BnaSSC06.CRC Gene Name: CRABS CLAW Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaCRCs with domestication preference positively correlate with the seed-setting rate of canola.

item.title: CmLEC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CL4474.Contig1 Gene Symbol: CmLEC1 Gene Name: LEAFY COTYLEDON1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CmLEC1 positively regulates the seed-setting rate in hybridization breeding of chrysanthemum.

item.title: ZjPOD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zj.jz015743041 Gene Symbol: ZjPOD1 Gene Name: Genome: reference jujube genomes, for ‘Dongzao’ Species: Ziziphus jujuba Functional Description: These results indicated that ZjPOD1 is an important candidate gene regulating seed-setting rate in jujube.
